section.heading: Effect of marriage or domestic partnership.
section.text: A premarital agreement becomes effective upon marriage or the registration of a domestic partnership under § 32-702.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 4 of the Uniform Premarital Agreement Act.
D.C. Law 16-79 rewrote section which had read as follows: “A premarital agreement becomes effective upon marriage.”
